testcase.name: add a User with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given the Admin User is registered with the bank............................passed And has access for adding new User..........................................passed When the Admin User provides details like firstname as "Michael", lastname as "Jackson" and department as "Finance".passed Then a User with name "Michael" is created successfully.....................passed

testcase.name: add a User with invalid details
testcase.system-out: Given the Admin User is registered with the bank............................passed And has access for adding new User..........................................passed When the Admin User provides details like firstname as "Jonathan", lastname as "null" and department as "HR".passed Then an error message "invalid user details" is displayed...................passed
